attributes.action: Get the BB postcode insurance premiums reduced
attributes.additional_details:
This petition has been set up, to fight to reduce car insurance in the BB postcodes. Also, to lower premiums for new learners, and young drivers.

At this moment in time, we are paying far too much for our insurance, in the bb area of england.

The BB area of england are being VICTIMIZED of high cost of insurance, and new learners and young drivers are being discriminated against, which is AGAINST THE LAW.

We are on a mission to get our local mps, local media and authorities on our side, to get it to the House of Commons to try to sort this.

Even if you dont drive, please join, sign and share. We need as many people as possible to make an impact, and make our voices heard.
